import pandas as pd
df_raw = spark.read.parquet(
    "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/sweden_medical.parquet",
    header=True, inferSchema=True
)
# convert to pandas
df = df_raw.toPandas()

# keep only the columns we care about
df_long = df[['ar', 'kon_label', 'atc','antal_expedieringar', 'antal_patienter']]

# sort based on time, gender, drug
df_long = df_long.sort_values(by=['ar', 'atc']).reset_index(drop=True)

#Change column names to our standardized names
df_long = df_long.rename(columns={
    'ar': 'year', 
'kon_label': 'sex', 
'atc':'atc_level_5', 
'antal_expedierinagr': 'expedited_ddd', 
'antal_patienter': 'users'
})

#Change Male and Female to M and F
df_long['sex'] = df_long['sex'].replace({
    'K': 'F'
})
df_long.head(30)

# Summera per år, kön, ATC
df_grouped = (
    df_long
    .groupby(["year", "sex", "atc_level_5"], as_index=False)
    [["antal_expedieringar", "users"]]
    .sum()
    .sort_values(["year", "atc_level_5"])
    .reset_index(drop=True)
)

# Visa de första 30 raderna
df_grouped.head(30)

# Summera per år, kön, ATC
df_grouped = (
    df_long
    .groupby(["year", "sex", "atc_level_5"], as_index=False)
    [["antal_expedieringar", "users"]]
    .sum()
    .assign(sex_order=lambda d: d["sex"].map({"M": 0, "F": 1}))
    .sort_values(["year", "atc_level_5", "sex_order"])
    .drop(columns="sex_order")
    .reset_index(drop=True)
)

# Visa de första 30 raderna
df_grouped.head(30)

#convert into spark df and store in our standardized folder
spark_df = spark.createDataFrame(df_long)
output_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/sweden_medicine.parquet"
spark_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(output_path)
